{"id":548630935,"lang":"cpp","time":"6 months, 1 week","timestamp":1630631065,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"95 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/548630935/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"20 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& n) {\n      vector<vector<int>> ans;\n        int m=n.size();\n        if(m<3)return ans;\n        sort(n.begin(),n.end());\n        for(int i=0;i<m-2;i++){\n            if(i>0 && n[i]==n[i-1])\n                continue;\n            int l=i+1;\n            int r=m-1;\n            while(l<r){                \n                int s=n[l]+n[r]+n[i];\n                if(s==0){\n                    ans.push_back({n[i],n[l],n[r]});\n                    while(l<r && n[l]==n[l+1])l++;\n                    while(l<r && n[r]==n[r-1])r--;\n                    l++;\n                    r--;                    \n                }\n                else if(s<0)l++;\n                else r--;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum"}
